content.rendered:
Who We Are

About Us

We do Real estate better

Hamrex Properties and Construction Limited is a contemporary real estate and construction company established to provide decent housing solutions to all classes of human endeavors.

Our mission is to make one million individuals landlords and one thousand real estate agents stable millionaires by 2050.

Daily, we strive to be the real estate company of choice for individuals seeking to make smart and profitable cash flow real estate investments in Africa.

Contact Us

Our Mission

individuals landlords

real estate agents millionaires

Our Team

Amadi Harry Excellent

woko Soruchi

living Enaanator ageyoi

  • Auditor

The Best Partner to Find a New Home

Contact Us

Testimonials

Hamrex Properties Limited is absolutely mind-blowing! The way they go above and beyond for your clients and Consultants is truly impressive. Your expertise and dedication are unmatched, and it's always a pleasure working with Hamrex Properties. Keep up the incredible work and continue to make waves in the real estate industry!
LESERE VIVIAN DESTINYEXECUTIVE OFFICER
